author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: فَوَ اللهِ مَنْ كَانَ فِي شِدَّةٍ أَوْ حُزْنٍ وَيَقْرَأُ هَذَا ٱلْلَّوْحَ بِصِدْقٍ مُبِينٍ يَرْفَعُ اللهُ حُزْنَهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ضُرَّهُ وَيُفَرِّجُ كَرْبَهُ
translation: By God! Should one who is in affliction or grief read this Tablet with absolute sincerity, God will dispel his sadness, solve his difficulties and remove his afflictions.
